Title: Document PBI export process
Description:
We need a standardized way to export the PBIs from Azure DevOps such that the conversion into a report works without flaws.

=================
INTERNAL DETAILS
=================

SOLUTION:

  • Use the Tag Report exclusively for PBIs to be reported.
  • Create a Query e.g. PBI Reporting, and add the Columns Description and Acceptance Criteria.
  • In the query export the items via Export to CSV.
  • The CSV serves as input to the PBI report builder.
Acceptance Criteria:
• The export process is documented.
  • An example CSV is exported for initial development of the report builder.
